1.「おきゃくさんでは ないのよ。| テティはね ほんきできたの！: You're not a customer... Teti is a real|person!

2.<if_woman>「おねえちゃん みててね。| テティ あそこから| ロープな: <if_woman>Hey, sweetie, look... Tetty, I'm going to|jump down from there without ropes!<else>Grandpa, look... Teti, I'm going to jump down|from there without ropes!<endif>

7.「みたみた？ やっぱり テティは | たすかっちゃうんだよ～！: Did you see that? I knew it! Teti is going to|love you!

8.「ロープを付けずに 飛び降りるとは……。| おじょうちゃん あんな危険なこと|: Jumping off without a rope... Ojou-chan,|don't ever do anything dangerous like that|again!

9.「もう！ テティは だいじょうぶなんだもん！: Oh, my God! Teti's gonna be okay!

10.「つぎはね……プ プクリッポ地方？ ってとこの| むらさき色の きりが モクモク:
Next time... The Pukulippo region? I want you|to take me to the bottom of the valley of the|bees... I want you to take me to the bottom|
|of the valley of the beetles!

12.「そこにはね コワ～イ魔物がいるのよ！| よろしく おねがいします！: There's a really scary monster out there! I'm|counting on you!

14.「あいつが コワ～イ魔物なのね……。: He's the scary one, isn't he?

15.<if_woman>「おねえちゃん みててね。| テティ あいつを ひとりでやっ: <if_woman>Hey, girl... Teti, I'm gonna take him down by|myself!<else>Hey, big guy... Teti, I'll take him down|alone!<endif>

16.<if_woman>「おねえちゃん おそいよ～。みててね。| テティ 今度こそ: <if_woman>You're my sister. I... Teti, this time I'm|going to kill him!<else>Hey, big guy... Mi... Teti, this time I'm|going to kill him!<endif>

17.「だいじょうぶ！ テティは ぜったい| だいじょうぶだから みてて！: I'm okay! Tetty's gonna be okay. Watch me!

22.<if_woman>「おねえちゃんが たおしてくれたのね……？| そっか～ そう: <if_woman>You saved me, didn't you? I see... So that's|why! That's why Teti won't die!<else>You saved me, didn't you, big brother? I|see... So that's why! That's why Teti won't|die!<endif>

23.「あのね あのね……| テティが転んだのは ぐうぜんじゃないんだよ。: You know what? You know what? It's not a|coincidence that Teti fell...

24.「テティはね ぜったいに しなないの。| どんなことがあっても| ぜったいに ま: Tetty, you're never gonna... No matter what|happens, you will be protected!

26.「だって！ シスター・サテラが| そういったんだもん！: Because! Because Sister Satera said so!

27.「町のみんなは…… シスター・サテラのこと | ウソの予言をした わるい人だって: Everyone in town... That Sister Saterra was a|bad person who made a false prophecy... I|told them over and over again...

28.「だから テティは| シスター・サテラの予言が ホントウだって| みんなに しん: So, Teti| Sister Satera's prophecy is true| I just wanted you all to know that

29.「どうしても やらなきゃいけない……| って思ったの！: I just had to do it. I just had to!

30.<if_woman>「……おねえちゃんのおかげで| シスター・サテラが のこして: <if_woman>... Thanks to you, I can tell everyone that|the prophecy Sister Saterra gave me was true!<else>... Thanks to you, I can tell everyone that|the prophecy Sister Satera gave me was true!<endif>

31.「テティを ここまで 連れてきてくれて| ありがとう……。| お礼に テティのた: Thank you for bringing Teti here... I'll give|you something from Teti's collection to thank|you!

32.「テティは レンドア島の教会で| シスター・サテラが 帰るのを まってるね！: Teti's at the church on Lendoa Island,|waiting for Sister Satera to come home!

33.バジエドは テティの足に|バンジーの命綱を 引っかけた！: Basiedo has hooked a bungee lifeline to|Teti's leg!
